Recruitable Heroes:
You can only recruit Heroes that
were released between Ver. 1.0
and Ver. 6.11.

You cannot recruit Heroes you
dispatch, or the Alfonse, Sharena,
or Anna from another world.
Book IX opening

To celebrate the arrival of
Book IX, a new castle design
is ready for you to use!

Take a look!

Having checked out the
Celestial Castle design,
do you want to use it?

If you change your mind, tap
Upgrade Castle, then Change
Design, then Celestial Castle.
Gust of Ostia
Celestial Castle
Calling Circle (D)

$aA reinforcement appears on turn $a0 if a
Mythic Hero with Defensive Team Call is on
your defensive team.
Note: See the Edit Defensive Team help menu
in the Aether Keep for details.
Calling Circle (O)

$aA reinforcement appears on turn $a0 and gets
an extra action once per turn if a Mythic Hero
with Raiding Party Call is in your raiding party.
Note: See the Edit Raiding Parties help menu in
the Battle menu for details.
Calling Circle
A magical circle that summons a reinforcement.
Celestial Throne

On this noble throne sits the Celestial King.
It has pointed legs, and something is hidden
within its black base, but what could it be?
Celestial Flag
Flag of Ásgarðr, origin of Rune and the gods.
Mysterious Tablet

A stone tablet in the same design as Rune's.
A kind of mysterious power emanates from it.

Raiding Party Mythic Effect 2:
If a Hero with the Mythic Effect:
Raiding Party Bonus is in a
raiding party (including in a
special or reinforcement slot)
during the corresponding season,
then the special slot can be used.

Raiding Party Mythic Effect 3:
If a Mythic Hero with the Mythic
Effect: Raiding Party Call is in a
raiding party (including in a
special or reinforcement slot)
during the corresponding season,
then the reinforcement slot can
be used.
Note: These slots have the same
criteria for Heroes as special slots
and do not impact Lift.

Reinforcements' stats increase
based on the Mythic Hero's total
number of merges, equivalent to
+2 Dragonflower per merge.

You must have a Calling Circle (O)
to use the reinforcement slot.

Calling Circle (O) cannot
be destroyed.

Defensive Team Mythic Effect 2:
If a Hero with the Mythic Effect:
Defensive Team Bonus is on a
defensive team (including in a
special or reinforcement slot)
during the corresponding season,
then the special slot can be used.

Defensive Team Mythic Effect 3:
If a Mythic Hero with the Mythic
Effect: Defensive Team Call is
on a defensive team (including in
a special or reinforcement slot)
during the corresponding season,
then the reinforcement slot can
be used.
Note: These slots have the same
criteria for Heroes as special slots
and do not impact Lift.

Reinforcements' stats increase
based on the Mythic Hero's total
number of merges, equivalent to
+2 Dragonflower per merge.

You must have a Calling Circle (D)
to use the reinforcement slot.

Calling Circle (D) cannot
be destroyed.

Disabled Effects in Chaos Season:
These seasonal Legendary and
Mythic effects will be disabled
during Chaos season:
・ Effects that boost ally's stats
・ Effects that change Lift gain or
Lift loss via blessings or merges
・ Special and reinforcement slots

Frosty Aether Stones

Used in Aether Raids to build structures that
are available for a limited time. If that period
has elapsed, these stones will be lost.
